text: Kuma me ya same ku, ba za ku ciyar ba domin ɗaukaka kalmar Allah, alhali kuwa gadon sammai da ƙasa na Allah ne? Wanda ya ciyar a gabanin cin nasara, kuma ya yi yaƙi daga cikinku, ba ya zama daidai (da wanda bai yi haka ba). waɗancan ne mafifita girman daraja* bisa ga waɗanda suka ciyar daga baya kuma suka yi yaƙi. Kuma dukansu Allah Ya yi musu wa'adi da (sakamako) mai kyau, kuma Allah Masani ne ga abin da kuke aikatawa
